title: Bug Splats after update.
body:
Pretty sure it was caused by update, guess ill see soon enough if more people start complaining.

Also when i press reconnect it just bugsplats once more. 

Here comes the lower prio le sigh :C

replies.body: Your update may not have installed properly and resulted in corrupt game files, which can result in a bug splat.  Other factors could include outdated drivers or something else entirely, but considering it's patch day this could be the culprit.  Go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to see if that helps.  Let me know if you have any questions!
